content: a loop yo and pull through 2 loops on your hook again copyright ©2025 sadika sobhan 3 yo and pull through 2 loops on your hook yo and pull through the remaining 2 loops on your hook beg dc3cl - into the indicated st or space join your yarn by making chain 2 yo into the same st or space insert your hook yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops repeat one more in the same st or space 3 loops on your hook yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on your hook dc3cl - yo into the indicated st or space insert your hook yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops repeat 2 more in the same st or space 4 loops on your hook yarn over and pull through all 4 loops on your hook fpdc2tog - yo insert your hook from front to back and back to front around the indicated stitch yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops again yo insert your hook from front to back and back to front around the indicated next stitch yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops 3 loops on your hook yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on your hook colourway colour a - wine red × 1 balls colour b - autumn yellow × 1 balls colour c - watermelon red × 1 balls colour d - candy corn × 1 balls colour e - grass green × 1 balls colour f - ink green × 1 balls copyright ©2025 sadika sobhan 4 note this pattern is for personal use only do not make any video tutorial without my permission you can t sell redistribute or edit this pattern in any way you can sell your finished products but you can t use my picture to promote them if you make my pattern and put photos of it on your blog or a website or your facebook page you should always credit me as the designer you may not reprint this design in a magazine or a book without asking me a design from the sky crochet copyright ©2025 sadika sobhan links my ravelry store facebook discussion and workshop group the sky crochet pattern group instagram @sadika_sobhan copyright ©2025 sadika sobhan 5 pattern instruction round 1 colour b/autumn yellow into magic_ring beg with chain 4 count as double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 × 9 times into the same magic_ring slip_stitch into 3rd chain of the beg chain 4 fasten_off total 10 double_crochet 10 chain 1 space round 2 colour c/watermelon red join your yarn into any chain 1 space by making chain 1 not count as st ph 1 single_crochet into the same st ph 2 single_crochet into next st chain 5 ph 3 4 single_crochet into next chain 1 space single_crochet into next st chain 5 × 9 times slip_stitch into first
